original_title: Dolores del Río: Princesa de México
overview: As one of Hollywood's pre-eminent Mexican bombshells, shining star Dolores Del Rio earned worldwide fame and admiration as a sexy "Mexicali Rose" -- and attracted the attention of high-profile suitors such as Orson Wells. This Spanish-language documentary celebrates the life and films of the legendary screen icon, including her later-life partnership with Mexican director Emilio "El Indio" Fernandez.
title: Dolores del Río: Princesa de México
